resources.string: Message unable to be copied. Memory is full
Copying message to SIM card failed.
The message is too long to copy.
Cannot preview empty slideshow. Please add slides.

"The SD card is unavailable while the device is in USB Mass Storage mode.
Disconnect from USB Mass Storage mode and try again."
Text can not be sent with slideshow attachments.
Message must have valid recipients to add or edit attachments.
Automatically resize picture before sending? Animation may be lost!
Some images could not be added.
Sorry, you cannot add this %1$s to your message.
Sorry, you cannot add this video to your message. Try a smaller video or compose a new one using Insert New Video.
Sorry, you cannot send this message.
The message and all attachments will be discarded.
The message and all attachments will be discarded because it has no valid recipients.
The message must contain valid recipients and content.
Too many recipients selected. The network limit is %1$d per message. Please select fewer recipients.
The message can be sent to a maximum of %1$d contacts. This message will not be sent to: %2$s.
A valid address is required to send this message.
Unable to find application to complete the requested action.
Messaging has been restricted. No outgoing messages are allowed.
Messaging has been restricted. Cannot download this message.
Creation mode restricted: restricted content was removed.
Attachment is too large and has been removed.
You are about to remove all the searches you have performed. These searches will no longer appear as search suggestions.
Manage messages stored on your SIM card
Display a signature at the end of every message
Avoid sending attachments that may not be supported by the receiving device
The entire conversation will be deleted.
All selected conversations will be deleted.
This protected message will be deleted.
All messages on the SIM will be deleted.
Picture will be resized to be sent
Picture was resized to be sent
Request a delivery report for each message you send
Use MMS when inserting a location
Automatically retrieve MMS messages while roaming
No messages on the SIM card.
Incoming message rejected due to full memory. Please delete old messages.
Incoming message rejected due to unknown reason.
A read report will be sent.
A large number of multimedia messages are being sent. Continue?
Could not store received SMS message.
Message delivery failed or message receipt failed.
Invalid destination address or invalid msg info.
Message delivery failed. Charging limitations not met.
Message delivery failed. Charging request not accepted.
Message delivery failed. Charging forwarding denied.
Message delivery failed. Charging not supported.
Message delivery failed. Address hiding unsupported.
Message delivery failed. Lack of prepaid.
To send or receive messages, turn off airplane mode.
To send or receive messages, insert a SIM card.
MMS messages can not be sent or received until the data connection is restored. Please check your MMS APN configuration in mobile network settings.
MMS messages can not be sent or received until your data access is re-enabled. Please check your data delivery settings to enable data connectivity.

You are about to insert a location card, which is a special name card that also contains location information. Messages containing a location card are sent and charged as multimedia messages (MMS). To insert location information as plain text only, go to Settings and turn off location cards.
Failed to add location to Favorites
Cannot send text message to Online Album.
Max number of chars reached for SMS. Convert to MMS to continue typing?
Max number of chars reached. No more chars are allowed.
Use caution when you send, share, distribute, transmit or copy pictures since they may contain the location where the picture was taken.
Do not show this message again.
The group message has been moved to the group thread.
Your outgoing group message type is set to Group conversation. Go to menu options or Settings to switch to Individual conversations.
Your outgoing group message type is set to Individual conversations. Go to menu options or Settings to switch to Group conversation.
Group conversation (everyone can reply to all)
The message has no contents. Send anyway?
The following recipients can not receive a group conversation message: %1$s. Send individual conversation messages to all recipients?
Up to 160 characters per message. Most special characters are not supported.
Up to 70 characters per message if special characters are used. Most special characters supported.
Fewer characters per message than Locking method. More special characters supported.
Fewer (variable number) characters per message. Some special characters supported.
Would you like to resize the video to meet the limitation?
"Can't add any more contacts. The network limit is %1$d per message."
Too many contacts selected. Please select fewer contacts.
Phone storage is full! Delete some files to free space.
Permission needed to read/write from/to message settings provider.
Cannot send text message to Plugger.
Cannot send text message to Plugger.
Cannot send text message to Plugger.
Cannot send text message to Plugger.
Cannot send text message to Plugger.

"Share your: • current location • saved location • place of interest by attaching it to your messages. Location Messages are sent as multimedia messages.
When searching for places on the map, data usage is billed at your plan's standard rate.
By using location messaging, you consent to the collection and use of information regarding the location of this phone and disclosure of location information to third parties in order to deliver these location based services. There is no representation, warranty or guarantee of reliability or of accuracy, completeness or timeliness of any data by using this location based service.
Certain software or technical information is provided by and licensed from third parties including TeleCommunication Systems, Inc., which may be covered by one or more U.S. Patents; and pending U.S. patent Apps, as well as pending counterpart European and international patents."

"All messages are billed per recipient at your plan's standard rates.
Group Conversation (Reply All): Like email, all recipients with compatible phones can see everyone on the \"To\" list and reply to everyone. Sent as multimedia messages.
Individual Messages: Like an email \"Bcc\" list, recipients can't see anyone on the list and can reply only to you.
"

"All messages are billed per recipient at your plan's standard rates.
Group Conversation (Reply All): Like email, all recipients with compatible phones can see everyone on the \"To\" list and reply to everyone. Sent as multimedia messages.
Individual Messages: Like an email \"Bcc\" list, recipients can't see anyone on the list and can reply only to you.
"

"All Messages are billed per recipient at your plan's standard rates.
Group Conversations (Reply All): Like email, all recipients with compatible phones can see everyone on the \"To\" list and reply to everyone. Group conversation messages appear in the same thread. Sent and billed as multimedia messages (MMS)."

"Like an email Bcc list, recipients can't see anyone on the list and can reply only to you.
These conversations appear as individual message threads between the sender and each recipient. Individual messages are sent and billed as text messages (SMS)."

"All Messages are billed per recipient at your plan's standard rates.
Group Conversations (Reply All): Like email, all recipients with compatible phones can see everyone on the \"To\" list and reply to everyone. Group conversation messages appear in the same thread. Sent and billed as multimedia messages (MMS)."

"Like an email Bcc list, recipients can't see anyone on the list and can reply only to you.
These conversations appear as individual message threads between the sender and each recipient. Individual messages are sent and billed as text messages (SMS)."

"Tasks helps you manage all of the items on your to-do list. Set reminders, group tasks and share items with friends and family.
To get started, touch on the add task button in the upper right corner."

"No tasks have tags.
Tags help you group tasks together.
To getting started, create tags."
This will mark all tasks as completed.
Title is empty, can not save.
Reminders stay in notification list until dismissed
A tag with the same name already exists. Please enter a unique value.
A tag cannot only include spaces
This will delete the tag %s and remove it from all tasks.

"No current tags are available.
Once you create a tag, you can assign the tag to tasks, allowing you to group tasks together under projects.
To create a tag, enter text in the field above and then select Add."
This account is not being synced and your tasks may not be up to date.
Marking a regenerative task complete may cause syncing errors depending upon your version of Exchange.
Creating or editing a regenerative task may cause syncing errors depending upon your version of Exchange.
Touch to review the message and try again.
